meta.description: Use ADDitude's ADHD and learning disabilities Online Directory to find help for an ADHD/ADD or Learning Disabilities (LD) diagnosis, treatment, educational resources, coaches, and more...
meta.keywords: attention deficit disorder directory, LD, adhd directory, ADhD coaches, organizers for ADD adults, therapists, psychologists, doctors, adhd schools and camps, support groups

title: The ADHD and Learning Disabilities Directory: ADD Coaches, Organizers, Doctors, Schools, Camps
cleaned_text: LOIS KAM HEYMANN, M.A., CCC-SLP, is a recognized leader in the treatment of children with listening, learning and auditory challenges. As a private speech and language pathologist, she has more than 30 years of experience working with families.
